ConfigurationTable.description: Connection information needed to connect to H2
ConfigurationTable.name: ConnectionInformation

FieldDefinition.description: The number of connections to add to the pool at once
FieldDefinition.name: acquireIncrement

FieldDefinition.description: The number of times to retry acquiring a connection to the database
FieldDefinition.name: acquireRetryAttempts

FieldDefinition.description: The number of milliseconds to wait until a retry to acquire a connection to the database
FieldDefinition.name: acquireRetryDelay

FieldDefinition.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection when the pool has no connections left to provide
FieldDefinition.name: checkoutTimeout

FieldDefinition.description: The number of seconds between periods where the connection pool retests all idle connections and discards any broken connections
FieldDefinition.name: idleConnectionTestPeriod

FieldDefinition.description: The number of connections initially available in the connection pool
FieldDefinition.name: initialPoolSize

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum number of seconds a connection exists before being discarded
FieldDefinition.name: maxConnectionAge

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum number of seconds a connection remains idle before being discarded from the pool
FieldDefinition.name: maxIdleTime

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max Idle Time For Excess Connections
FieldDefinition.description: The amount of time before connections are culled down to minPoolSize
FieldDefinition.name: maxIdleTimeExcessConnections

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum number of connections to create in the connection pool
FieldDefinition.name: maxPoolSize

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum number of statements the connection pool will cache
FieldDefinition.name: maxStatements

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum number of statements the connection pool will cache per connection
FieldDefinition.name: maxStatementsPerConnection

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum allowed number of connections in the connection pool
FieldDefinition.name: minPoolSize

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Flag to detect usage of MVStore storage
FieldDefinition.description: Flag to let H2 know whether to user MVStore storage or not. MVStore is default storage engine in 1.4.X versions of H2 database.
FieldDefinition.name: mvStore

FieldDefinition.description: The number of helper threads to spawn
FieldDefinition.name: numHelperThreads

FieldDefinition.description: The password used to log into the database
FieldDefinition.name: password

FieldDefinition.description: How long to wait for a table lock to release for rolling back a transaction
FieldDefinition.name: tableLockTimeout

FieldDefinition.description: Whether or not to check if a connection is broken before distributing it from the connection pool
FieldDefinition.name: testConnectionOnCheckout

FieldDefinition.description: The amount of time to wait for a response from an unresponsive connection before discarding it
FieldDefinition.name: unreturnedConnectionTimeout

FieldDefinition.description: The username used to log into the database
FieldDefinition.name: username

ConfigurationTable.description: PersistentPropertyProcessorSettings settings for persistent property queueing
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistentPropertyProcessorSettings

FieldDefinition.description: Bypass queuing
FieldDefinition.name: bypassPersistentQueueing

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Value Stream Writes in Process Block
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of value stream writes to process in one block
FieldDefinition.name: maximumBlockSize

FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of value stream entries to queue (will be rejected after that)
FieldDefinition.name: maximumQueueSize

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max Wait Time Before Flushing Value Stream Buffer (millisec)
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum wait time before flushing value stream buffer in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: maximumWaitTime

FieldDefinition.description: Rate at which to check the buffer status in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: scanRate

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Items Before Flushing Value Buffer
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of items to accumulate before flushing value stream buffer
FieldDefinition.name: sizeThreshold

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Stream Writes in Process Block
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of stream writes to process in one block
FieldDefinition.name: maximumBlockSize

FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of stream entries to queue (will be rejected after that)
FieldDefinition.name: maximumQueueSize

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max Wait Time Before Flushing Stream Buffer (millisec)
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum wait time before flushing stream buffer in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: maximumWaitTime

FieldDefinition.description: Number of processing threads
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfProcessingThreads

FieldDefinition.description: Rate at which to check the buffer status in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: scanRate

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Items Before Flushing Stream Buffer
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of items to accumulate before flushing stream buffer
FieldDefinition.name: sizeThreshold

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Value Stream Writes in Process Block
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of value stream writes to process in one block
FieldDefinition.name: maximumBlockSize

FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of value stream entries to queue (will be rejected after that)
FieldDefinition.name: maximumQueueSize

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max Wait Time Before Flushing Value Stream Buffer (millisec)
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum wait time before flushing value stream buffer in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: maximumWaitTime

FieldDefinition.description: Number of processing threads
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfProcessingThreads

FieldDefinition.description: Rate at which to check the buffer status in milliseconds
FieldDefinition.name: scanRate

FieldDefinition.aspect.friendlyName: Max no. of Items Before Flushing Value Buffer
FieldDefinition.description: Maximum number of items to accumulate before flushing value stream buffer
FieldDefinition.name: sizeThreshold
